events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it because the product does not meet my expectations. How can I get a refund?
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's desire to return the purchased item and receive their money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the order returned by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can assist you more efficiently?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I want to return the headphones because they donâ€™t fit well and the sound quality is not what I expected.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the item back using the prepaid return label that I will send to your email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the product back today.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method in the next 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support and have a great day!
